files.patch: @@ -339,1 +339,11 @@ - // Add tab order to only plain text to avoid widget_tabbable_single(potential violation) + /** + * The attribute tabindex="0" allows a non-form/link/object element to be placed + * in the default navigation order, making any element focusable and capable of triggering interaction. + * + * In this context, we add tab order only to plain text elements. This is done to + * avoid potential violations of the `widget_tabbable_single` rule, which states + * that a component with a "tablist" role should not have more than one tabbable element. + * + * For more information on the `widget_tabbable_single` rule, please refer to the following documentation: + * widget_tabbable_single + */
